meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Frank Patrick Lena Nowak Steve Angelo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2371.

td.p: Frank Patrick, an industrial engineer from Hillsborough, New Jersey
Lena Nowak, a proofreader from Chicago, Illinois
Steve Angelo, a CPA originally from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,001)

tr.td: 20th CENTURY AMERICA
PRO FOOTBALL
TRAVEL & TOURISM
MUSICAL TERMS
NUTRITION
QUOTABLE QUOTES
(Alex: Are there any other kind?)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
